gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AssetsNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Assets` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` SHOULD not exist for any period other than the current period.

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to + `Assets`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST101Variable1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST101Variable1_Assets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityAndLiabilities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityAndLiabilities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityAndLiabilities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityAndLiabilitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
